table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_user` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` char(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '账号', `userpass` char(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密码', `loginip` char(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '上次登陆ip', `logintime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '上次登陆时间', `rename` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户昵称', `sex` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '性别', `birthday` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '生日', `score` int(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '积分', `email` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `mobile` char(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电话', `mobile1` char(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电话1', `mobile2` char(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电话2', `address` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `other` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `lock` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '锁定', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
